description: This hex’s terrain is not easy to deal with. Whether it’s steep cliffs, bubbling lava lakes or swift rivers, the crew takes +1⭕ to move across it, and all characters must pass a DEX check or suffer D20 damage.

This hex is actively populated by some form of animal life, either as a hunting ground, nest or gathering spot. An encounter with Local Fauna is triggered automatically.
This hex offers no obstacles whatsoever—perhaps it is a hidden or secluded area, protected from the dangers that lurk outside. No combat encounters can take place here.
